title: [Ryo Parker]
abstract: An old sailboat sinks into the sea after being hit by a large rock.
description: A sailor experiences a huge fire and subsequent sinking of his sailing ship after he hits a large rock.  A fish saves him as he nearly drowns.  Once on shore, the sailor goes to the shipyards and purchases another ship and sails off into sea.  An animated short entered to "Create a Stamp Story" section of ACMI's 'Screen It' media making competition for Primary Schools.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006682; Stamps coming to life: Anderson Creek Primary School; Active; 2004
